mapper.select: SELECT sa.id, sa.user_id, sa.receiver_name, sa.phone, sa.province, sa.city, sa.county, sa.is_del, CONCAT( a1.area_name, a2.area_name, a3.area_name, sa.detailed_address ) AS detailed_address FROM djmall_shipping_address sa LEFT JOIN djmall_area a1 ON sa.province = a1.id LEFT JOIN djmall_area a2 ON sa.city = a2.id LEFT JOIN djmall_area a3 ON sa.county = a3.id WHERE sa.user_id = #{userId} AND sa.is_del = 'NOT_DEL'
